title: Joe Manchin calls Biden ‘cavalier’ and ‘divorced from reality’ after comments on shuttering coal plants
dc:creator: Aamer Madhani, Matthew Daly, The Associated Press
description: "It seems his positions change daily depending on the audience and politics of the day," Manchin said of the president.
content:encoded: "It seems his positions change daily depending on the audience and politics of the day," Manchin said of the president. Read More
